title: Land of tomorrow
creator_credit: Australian National Airways, Cinesound Movietone and Frank Coffey
brief_description: A tribute is made to Bristol Aeroplane Ltd, manufacturers of the Bristol Type 170 “Freighter”, the aeroplane that made beef by air an economic feasibility mainly in the Kimberley region of Western Australia.
